trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for lengths of <see langword="EmphasisBreak" /> between spoken words.
trans-unit.target: 列舉所讀出單字之間的 <see langword="EmphasisBreak" /> 長度值。

trans-unit.source: The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: 設定中斷強調<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>透過執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>所傳回物件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>屬性的執行個體上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>。

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: 每個綜合語音引擎就可以決定如何呈現文字; 之間的中斷強調的本質不同語言、 方言、 性別或語音。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>時設定或取得可能需要使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: 兩個值可能會區別的事實的實際值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>是所有小於零和值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>會大於或等於零，與使用的值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>傳回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>所傳回物件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>執行個體上的屬性。
